title: Build Body Fitness Tracking System website

requirements.text: Create a Home page with project title 'Body Fitness Tracking System by Rajeshwar Chaudhari', a short introduction about the system's purpose, a hero section with a fitness-themed background image, a 'Get Started' button that navigates to the dashboard, and a navigation bar with links to Home, Dashboard, Features, BMI Calculator, About, and Contact pages

quotes: Project Title: Body Fitness Tracking System by Rajeshwar Chaudhari
Navigation bar (Home, Dashboard, Features, BMI Calculator, About, Contact)

acceptanceCriteria: Home page displays the project title prominently
Hero section includes a fitness-themed background image
Get Started button is visible and functional
Navigation bar contains all six links and is visible on all pages

requirements.text: Add a footer to all pages displaying 'BYK College of Commerce', team members section, and the academic year '2025-26'

quotes: Footer with college name byk college of commerce, team members, and year-2025-26

acceptanceCriteria: Footer appears on all pages
Footer displays 'BYK College of Commerce'
Footer includes team members section
Footer shows '2025-26' academic year

requirements.text: Add date selection option and reset button to the User Dashboard to allow users to view and reset their daily tracking data
acceptanceCriteria: Date picker allows selection of different dates
Reset button clears all daily tracking data

requirements.text: Create a BMI Calculator page with input fields for height in cm and weight in kg, calculate BMI using the formula BMI = weight / (height in meters)¬≤, and display the BMI value and category (Underweight, Normal, Overweight, Obese) in a styled result card
acceptanceCriteria: Input fields accept height in cm and weight in kg

requirements.text: Implement a Water Intake Tracker that adds 250ml per click, shows a daily goal of 2 liters, and visualizes progress with a progress bar
acceptanceCriteria: Each click adds exactly 250ml to water intake
Daily goal is set to 2 liters (2000ml)

requirements.text: Create a Step Counter section with a manual step input field, display a daily goal of 10,000 steps, and show progress using an animated circular progress bar
acceptanceCriteria: Input field allows manual entry of step count
Daily goal displays as 10,000 steps
Circular progress bar animates to show progress percentage
Progress bar updates when step count changes

requirements.text: Create a Features page listing the system capabilities: Smart Tracking, Health Analytics, BMI Calculator, Goal Setting, Progress Reports, and Mobile Responsive Design
acceptanceCriteria: Features page displays all six feature items
Each feature has a clear title and description
Page layout is visually consistent with overall design

requirements.text: Create an About page with project description, problem statement, objectives, a list of technologies used (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Chart.js), and a team members section
acceptanceCriteria: About page includes a project description section
Problem statement is clearly stated
Objectives are listed
Technologies section mentions HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Chart.js
Team members section is present

requirements.text: Create a Contact page with a form containing name, email, and message input fields, a submit button, and display college contact details for BYK College of Commerce
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes name, email, and message fields
Submit button is functional

requirements.text: Implement local storage to persist all user tracking data including steps, water intake, calories, and BMI calculations across browser sessions

quotes: Store user data using Local Storage

acceptanceCriteria: All tracking data is saved to local storage
Data persists after page refresh
Data persists after browser restart
User can continue tracking from where they left off

requirements.text: Implement responsive design ensuring the website works seamlessly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices using CSS Flexbox and Grid
acceptanceCriteria: Layout adapts to different screen sizes
All functionality works on mobile devices
Navigation is mobile-friendly
Content is readable on all screen sizes

requirements.text: Apply a fitness-themed design style with card-based layout, gradient buttons, soft shadows, minimalist and professional aesthetic, fitness-themed icons, and use modern fonts like Poppins or Roboto from Google Fonts

quotes: Use modern fonts (like Google Fonts ‚Äì Poppins or Roboto)

acceptanceCriteria: Design uses card-based components throughout
Buttons have gradient styling
Soft shadows are applied to cards and elements
Fitness-themed icons are used appropriately

requirements.text: Add basic animations and hover effects to interactive elements throughout the website

quotes: Include basic animations and hover effects

acceptanceCriteria: Buttons have hover effects
Cards have subtle animations on interaction
Transitions are smooth and professional
Animations enhance user experience without being distracting

requirements.text: Implement a dark mode toggle that allows users to switch between light and dark themes across all pages
acceptanceCriteria: Toggle switch is visible on all pages
Theme preference persists across sessions
All pages adapt to dark mode styling

requirements.text: Create a basic frontend-only login and register system allowing users to create accounts and log in (no backend authentication required)
acceptanceCriteria: Registration form collects username and password
Login form authenticates against stored credentials
User credentials are stored in local storage
Login state persists across sessions
Dashboard is only accessible after login

constraints: Use only React with TypeScript for frontend implementation, not plain HTML/CSS/JavaScript
Do not integrate external Chart.js library; use React-compatible charting solution or custom SVG charts
Store all data in backend Motoko actor, not browser local storage
Use Tailwind CSS for styling instead of plain CSS3
nonGoals: Backend database connectivity beyond Motoko actor storage
Real authentication with password hashing or external auth providers
Integration with actual fitness tracking devices or APIs
